mapper.select: SELECT UNIT_ID , RATIO FROM (SELECT UNIT_ID, (CASE UNIT_ID WHEN 'A' THEN UNIT_FREQUENCY * (10/UNIT_RANGE) WHEN 'E' THEN UNIT_FREQUENCY * (10/UNIT_RANGE) ELSE UNIT_FREQUENCY END) RATIO FROM UNIT_STATS ORDER BY RATIO ASC) WHERE 3 >= ROWNUM
mapper.update: UPDATE UNIT_STATS SET UNIT_FREQUENCY = (SELECT SUM(NUMERAL_FREQUENCY) FROM NUMERAL_STATS WHERE UNIT_ID_FK = #{unitId}) WHERE UNIT_ID = #{unitId}
